description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget named HeroBanner, which displays a hero section with a background image, gradient overlay, search stub, title, tags as chips, action buttons, and synopsis. It handles focus, parallax effects, and visual effects like blurring and gradient overlays, integrating various UI components.
